snippet.title: Meteor Command Recruiting Now!
snippet.description:
iPhone: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/meteor-command/id1371688535?ls=1&mt=8
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.venabyte.meteorcommand

Citizens of Planet Earth,
WE NEED YOU! (and your VR gear!)

As the Galactic Recruiters of Space Skill, we have been tasked to find intelligent life with the technological capability to linkup to our colony defenses and manually pilot them. Thousands of our expansion colonies lie in heavy asteroid belt zones and are under constant meteor threat.
